item.title: OverTheWire.org Bandit Level 12 -> Level 13
item.description: http://overthewire.org/wargames/bandit/bandit13.html Bandit Level 12 → Level 13 Level Goal The password for the next level is stored in the file data.txt, which is a hexdump of a file that has been repeatedly compressed. For this level it may be useful to create a directory under /tmp in which you can work using mkdir. For example: mkdir /tmp/myname123. Then copy the datafile using cp, and rename it using mv (read the manpages!
